title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull & manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or chat endpoints in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); chat history, model manager, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with prompt templates, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like code-completion plugin for VS Code backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Jackson models, Android compatible.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with REST wrapper and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration with Ollama; threaded replies, app mentions, and model switching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync clients and typed request/response structs for Ollama.

title: ollama-gpt-prompt
summary: VS Code extension that sends highlighted code to Ollama and injects generated docstrings or tests.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming json decoder.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated registry of model tags and Modelfiles officially maintained by the Ollama team.
